: : : : : hwmʾst Y bwn : : : : hāuuanīm P+. ā P+. ratīm P+. ā P+. haōmō P+. upāit̰ P+. z araϑuštrəm P+. ātǝrəm P+. pairi.yaōždaϑəṇtəm P+. gāϑā̊sca P+. srāuuaiiaṇtəm P+006 ā P+. dǝm P+. pərəs at̰ P+. zaraϑuštrō P+. kō P+. narǝ P+. ahī P+006 yim P+. azəm P+. īs v īspahe P+. aŋhǝ̄uš P+. astauuatō P+. srīštəm P+. d ādarəsa P+. x​ͮahe P+. gaiiehe P+. x​ͮanauuatō P+. amə ṣ̌ahe P+006 āat̰ P+. maē P+. aēm P+. paitiiaōxta P+. haō mō P+. aṣ̌auua P+. dīraōšō P+006 azəm P+. ahmi P+. zaraϑuštra haōmō P+. aṣ̌auua P+. dīraōšō P+006 ā P+. mą̇m P+. yāsaŋ hī P+. spitama P+. frā- -mąm P+. hunauuaŋha P+. x​ͮarətǝ̄e P+006 aōui P+. mąm P+. staōmaini P+. stīiδi P+. yaϑa.mā P+006 aparacit̰ P+. saōš́iiaṇtō P+. stauuąn P+006 āat̰ P+. aō xta P+. zaraϑuštrō P+006 nəmō P+. haōmāi P+006 kasəϑβąm P+. paōiriiō P+. haōma P+. maš́iiō P+. astuuaiϑiiāi P+. hu nīta P+. gaēϑiiāi P+. kā P+. ahmāi P+. aṣ̌iš P+. ərənā uui- -cit̰ P+. ahmāi P+. jasat̰ P+. āiiaptəm P+. āat̰ P+. m ē P+. aēm P+. paitiiaōxta P+. haōmō P+. aṣ̌auua P+. dī raōšō P+006 vīuuaŋhā̊ P+. mąm P+. paōiriiō P+. maš́iiō P+. astauuaiϑiiāi P+. hunīta P+. gaēϑaiiāi P+. hā P+. ahmāi P+. aṣ̌ǝš P+. ərənāuui- -tat̰ P+. ahmāi P+. jasa t̰ P+. āiiaptəm P+. yat̰ P+. hē P+. puϑra P+. us.zaiiata The absence of the separating dot at the end of the line does not necessarily indicate that the last word word on the line and its following one on the next line are considered as univerbated in the manuscript. It is confirmed by the marginal catchword (.ax) occuring at the page bottom of fol 37. The reason is that while there is no dot between dātaiia (37v17) and axšaiiamnǝm (38r1), the catchword places a dot befor ax. Therefore, in the transcription, complete words occuring at the end of the line without a separating dot are takes as single unit. yō P+. yimō P+. xšaētō P+. huuąϑβō P+006 x​ͮarənaŋha stəō x​ͮarənaŋha stəmō P+. zātanąm P+. huuarə.darəsō P+. maš́iiuną m P+006 yat̰ P+. kərənōt̰ P+. aŋ́he P+. xšaϑrāδa P+. amǝrǝ šaṇta P+. pasu.vīra P+. aŋhōšəmne P+. āpa. uruuairi P+. x​ͮairiiąn P+. x​ͮarətəm P+. ajiiamnəm P+006 y imahe P+. xšaϑre P+. auruuahe P+. nōit̰ P+. aōϑəm P+. ā̊ŋha P+. nōit̰ P+. garəməm P+. nōit̰ P+. zauruua P+. ā̊ŋ ha P+. nōit̰ P+. marəϑiiuš P+. nōit̰ P+. araskō P+. daēuu ō.dātō The compositional sign is v-shaped. P+. paṇca.dasa P+. fracarōiϑe P+. p aiti P+. puϑrasca P+. raōδaēšuua P+. katarascit̰ P+006 yauuata P+. xš́iiōt̰ xš́iiōit̰ P+. huuąϑβō P+. yǝmō P+. v īuuaŋhatō P+. puϑrō P+006 kasiϑβąm P+. bitiiō P+. h gaēϑą m P+. mahrkāi P+. aṣ̌ahe P+. gaēϑanąm P+006 kasi. ϑβąm P+. ϑrǝϑiiō P+. haōma P+. maš́iiō P+. astuuaiϑ iiāi P+. hunīta P+. gaēϑaiiāi P+. kā P+. ahmā i P+. aṣ̌ǝš P+. ərənāuua- -cit̰ P+. ahmāi P+. The compositional dot is composed of three vertical dots. P+006 hukǝrfš P+. huuarǝš P+006 vǝrǝϑrajā̊ P+. zairi.gaōnō P+. ną miiąsuš P+006 yaϑa P+. x​ͮarǝṇte P+. vahištō P+. urunaēc a P+. puϑmaińiiō.tǝmō P+006 nī P+. tē P+. zāiri P+. maδǝm P+. mruii ē P+006 nī P+. amǝm P+. nī P+. vǝrǝϑraγnǝm P+. nī dasuuarǝm P+. nī P+. baēšazǝ m P+. nī- -fradaϑǝm P+. nī P+. vǝrǝdaϑǝm P+. nī P+. aōjō P+. vīspō. tanīm P+. nī P+. mastīm P+. vīspō.paēsaŋhǝm P+006 nī P+. tat̰ P+. yaϑa P+. gaēϑā̊.huua P+. vasō.xšaϑrō P+. f racarāne P+. t̰baēšō.tauruuā̊ P+. drujim.vanō P+006 nī P+. tat̰ P+. yaϑa P+. tauruuaiieni P+. vīspanąm P+. t̰bi šuuatąm P+. t̰baēšā̊ P+. daēuuanąm P+. maš́iiānąm ca P+. P+. maš́ii ehe P+. druuatō P+. sāstrǝš P+. aiβiuuō.ižd aiiaṇtahe P+. kǝmǝrǝdǝm P+006 kihrpǝm P+. nāšǝm nāi P+. aṣ̌aōne P+. haōma P+. zāiri P+. δe P+006 vadarǝjai δe P+006 paiti P+. aṣ̌ǝmōγahe P+. anaṣ̌aōnō P+. ahīm ǝrǝcō P+. aŋ́hā̊ P+. daēnaiiā̊ P+. mąs P+. vaca P+. daϑā nahe P+. nōit̰ P+. š́iiaōϑanāiš P+. apaiieṇtah e P+006 kihrpǝm P+. nāšǝmnāi P+. aṣ̌aōne P+. haōma P+. zāiri P+. vadarǝjaide P+006 paiti P+. jahe.kaiiāi P+. yātumaitiiāi P+. maōδanō.kairiiāi P+. upašt ā.bairiiāi P+. yeŋ́he P+. frafrauuaiti P+. manō P+. ya ϑa P+. aβrǝm P+. vātō.šaētǝm P+. kihrpǝm P+. nāšǝmnā i P+. aṣ̌aōne P+. haōma P+. zāiri P+. vadarǝjaiδe P+006 ya t̰ P+. hē P+. kihrpǝm P+. nāšǝmnāi P+. aṣ̌aōne P+. haōma P+. zāiri P+. vadarǝjaiδe P+. bwy ʾz ʾtš dʾdn viš P+. apą m P+. iδa P+. patǝṇtu P+. P+. yat̰ P+. haōmahe P+. aṣ̌auuazaŋhō P+. fratarǝmci t̰ P+. tē P+. huuanǝm P+. vaca P+. upa.staōmi P+. huxrata uuō P+. yahmi P+. niγne P+. narš P+. aōjaŋha P+006 staōmi P+. m aēγǝmca P+. vārǝmca P+. yātē P+. kihrpǝm P+. vax šaiiatō P+. barǝšnuš P+. paiti P+. gairinąm P+006 staō mi P+. gairiiō P+. bǝrǝzaṇtō P+. yaϑra P+. haōma P+. urīru δuša P+006 staōmi P+. ząm P+. pǝrǝϑβīm P+. paϑanąm P+. v arǝzi.aŋ́huuąm P+. x​ͮāparąm P+. bǝrǝϑrīm P+. tē P+. haō ma P+. aṣ̌āum P+006 staōmi P+. zimō P+. yaϑa P+. raōδahe P+. hubaōiδiš P+. auruuō P+. carānǝm P+006 uta P+. mazdā̊ P+. huruϑ ma P+. haōma P+. raōse P+. gara P+. paiti P+006 uta P+. frāδaēš a P+. viš.paϑa P+. haiϑīmca P+. aṣ̌ahe P+. xā̊ P+. ahe P+. varǝδiiaŋha P+. mana P+. vaca MN vīspǝ̄sca P+. pa iti P+. varǝšajīš P+. vīspǝ̄sca P+. paiti P+. frasparǝ γǝ̄ P+. vīspǝ̄sca P+. paiti P+. frauuāxšǝ̄ P+. 2 bʾl zwd rʾsfy hr dw bgw y šn bwy bh ʾtš dʾdn haōmō P+. uxš́iieiti P+. stauu anō P+. aϑa P+. nā P+. yō P+. dǝm P+. staōiti P+. vǝrǝϑrająst arō P+. bauuaiti P+006 nǝtǝmacit̰ P+. haōma.hīitiš P+. nǝt ǝmacit̰ P+. haōma.stīitiš P+. nǝtǝmacit̰ P+. ma P+. haō ma.x​ͮarǝitiš P+. hazaŋraγniiāi P+. asti P+. daēuuanąm P+. nasiieiti P+. haϑra P+. frā.kǝrǝsta P+. am̨at̰ P+. hac a P+. nǝmānāt̰ P+. āhitiš P+006 yaϑra P+. bāδa P+. upāzai ti P+. yaϑra P+. bāδa P+. upastaōiti P+. haōmahe P+. b aēšaziiehe P+006 ciϑrǝm P+. dasuuarǝm P+. baēšazǝm P+. ahe P+. vīse P+. uta P+. mēϑanǝm P+. vīspe P+. zī P+. a ńiiǝ̄ P+. maδā̊ŋhō P+. aēšma P+. haciṇte P+. xrauuīdr uuō P+006 āat̰ P+. hō P+. yō P+. haōmahe P+. maδō P+. aṣ̌a P+. hacaiti P+. P+. aṣ̌ auuāzō P+. daδąmi P+. imąm P+. tanīm P+. yā P+. mē P+. vaēnai ti P+. huraōδa P+. ϑβaxšāi P+. haōmāi P+. maδāi P+. hauu aŋhāi P+. aṣ̌auuastāi P+. pairi P+. mǝ̄ P+. tīmcit̰ P+. daiiā̊ haōma P+. sh xwrdn w dhʾn pʾk krdn rʾsfy ʾšm why dw gftn zwd frʾhwm hmʾ xwrdn w rʾsfy ʾšm why dw gftn w zwd hr dw dst fh pʾd yʾw krdn ʾwr brsm nhʾdn aṣ̌ǝm P+. vohī P+. chʾr gftn yaϑā P+. ah ī P+. vairiiō P+. P+. aṣ̌auuanǝm P+. P+. ax dāiiata axšaiiamnǝm P+. druuaṇtǝm P+. vasō.xšaϑrō P+. hiiāt̰ P+. aṣ̌auua P+. auuasō.xšaϑrō P+. hiiāt̰ P+. druuā̊ P+. gatō P+. hamistō P+. nǝžbǝrǝtō P+. haca P+. spǝṇtahe P+. maińiiǝ̄ uš P+. dāmabiiō P+. varatō P+. auuasō.xšaϑrō P+. haxš iia P+. azǝmcit̰ P+. yōi P+. zaraϑuštrō P+. fratǝmąm P+. nǝmā nanąmca P+. vīsąmca P+. zaṇtunąmca P+. dax́iiunąm ca P+. aŋ́hā̊ P+. daēnaiiā̊ P+. anu.mataiiaēca P+. anu.ux taiiaēca P+. anu.varǝštaiiaēca P+. yā̊ P+. āhīi rǝš P+. zaraϑuštrš P+. rauuasca P+. x​ͮāϑrǝmca P+. āfrīnā mi P+. vīspaiiā̊ P+. aṣ̌aōnō P+. staōiš P+. ązasca P+. du žāϑrǝmca P+. āfrīnāmi P+. vīspaiiā̊ P+. druuatō P+. stōiš P+006
